cab.content: SEC RSS ToBATTLE SITUATION - HOOK - 8th JUKE, 1918.1.The situation:remains unchanged. The French capturedHILL 204, west of CHATEAU-THIERRY.As the result of an attack by French and American divisions the villages of BOURESOHES,' VEUILLY-LA-PO TERIE, VINLY and the eastern edge of CHEZY were gained and 200 prisoners capturedsGreat activity and movement continues on the NOYON -MOHTDTDIER front where deserters state that an attack is imminent20 There is nothing to report on the British front..erj only. -General Staff,War Office, S.W.1.8th June, 19180Issued at 12B35 p*m*
